name: Deep Sleep (ItsGeppy)
description:
NOTE! - Audio's delayed in HTML version of the game, if you're bothered by this, download the executable!

This game was made for VimJam
Focus: Collectables
Theme: There and back

It's morning and you gotta wake up for work, you hear the alarm clocks, but to wake up you need to collect all the clocks and escape the room before deep sleep ghosts catch you. They'll follow your every step and will eventually catch and make you fall into Deep Sleep if you're not careful. Use your Dream Pillow to traverse through 15 different and challenging levels! Good luck!

This is my first finished project as well as my first jam. I hope you enjoy this little game as much as I enjoyed making it!

My best times:
- Hard: 193 seconds
- Normal: 175 seconds
